Wed, 28 Aug 2024 00:24:53 +0000 Michael Bond (pictured) and YMP teammate Heath Tupara had a successful weekend in two sporting arenas. The veteran pair helped YMP A to victory in the Poverty Bay A Grade men's club hockey final on Saturday afternoon and the next morning combined to win their Te Kanawa Cup men's pairs semifinal at the Electrinet Park Golf Club. Photo /Paul Rickard
